task.title: Task: Frequency distribution
task.shortdesc: How to make a frequency distribution of the data with the FREQUENCY function.

context.p: With function FREQUENCY you can create a frequency distribution.
The first argument is an array with the values. The second argument is an array with the intervals into which you want to group the values. The result is an array with the frequencies.

step.cmd: Create an new file or a new worksheet.
Enter the data in columns A and B as shown in the figure.

result.p: The result is a frequency table. In the explanation in the figure, you can read how the boundaries of the interval are dealt with.
